title: Looking for substitutes for our team for the OOL Tournament Bronze +
body: We are looking for people who don't mind substituting for our team, as the Top sub, and the Jg sub and a Mid sub, for the OOL tournament, if you are willingly wanting to play, add me on league, my IGN is JT BBE, and ill reply back to you as soon as i can. Also if you are considering to sub for the team, please add me asap because we will need to begin our training our team to whether you should sub or actually play the role if you are good enough, thanks :)

replies.body: Yo id like to join i can play any of those roles my name ingame is "my name is a jeff"
